nodes.text: Wait a minute. Are you trying to say you're one of the Enclave replacements? If that's the case, then why aren't you alone?
Huh? Uh... Well sure it is. I heard tell of it a while back! Navarro military base, southeast of San Francisco.
Shaman? Look here; if your shaman says he sees things flying around and scooping up people then he's been sniffing too many herbs. Got it?
Uh... Hey, I'm just told to shy off visitors and such. I don't want the kind of trouble you're talking.
You see Chris, the gas station attendant.
(speaking into radio) Alert! We got an intruder at the station! Alert!
You see an old man.
You're back. What can old Chris help you with?
I know they fly over here from time to time. They're usually heading south toward San Fran. If you're interested in vertibirds, I'd head there.
Damn, that's a hell of a list... Uh, well, if something comes up I'll... Yeah, well, I got some things to do.
I suppose that would be through the trap door in the floor of my room.  Just go and leave me be.
Fuck you! You want to see sorry? I got some boys who'll show you a whole new meaning for the word! (starts to turn the radio on)
Well, nice talking with you. Here's some advice though - ain't nothing in these parts except wasteland and radiation. Civilization's south of here. I'd be heading that way if I was you.
Fuck you! (takes a radio out of robe) You want to see sorry? I got some boys who'll show you a whole new meaning for the word! (starts to turn the radio on)
Navarro? Ain't heard that name in ages. Old military base southeast of San Fran, and that's a ways south of here.

Damn. Sorry for the hassles. I'm supposed to clear a bunch of newbies coming through here but I got to weed out the trash. Anyway, just go up to the gate, through the woods there, and give 'em the password. It's 'sheepshead.' Oh, and stay on the path!
Wait a minute. Are you trying to say you're one of the Enclave replacements?
Well, I don't mean to be rude or nothing, but this here's private property. If you're going to be poking around somewhere, don't be doing it here.
Vertibirds? That's an interesting subject. Now why would you be asking about them here?
You look familiar. Old Chris thinks he's seen you before... Nope, can't be.
What the...?!
Join up? You're a tribal! What makes you think they'd want a tribal, and his posse no less?
Well, that doesn't mean anything to me, but in case I see one of these vertibirds, whom should I be telling?
The Shi, huh? Well if you say so. I'll send word to 'em down in Chiny town. Meanwhile, I got things to do.
This here's my place, Chris's. It's a service station - ain't you ever seen one of those, in old magazines and such? That's what I got here - a service  station.
Enclave? That a group or something? That don't ring no chimes with me. What you want with 'em?
Yeah, right.
The Brotherhood... Uh, yeah, well, I'll do just that. Meanwhile,  I got things to do.
The Hubs? Yeah, sure, I'll send word if something comes up. Meanwhile, I got things to do.
Howdy, stranger. Ain't seen you around these parts before. What can old Chris do for you?

links.text: You lie me. Me no got patience. You tell truth or me make you sorry!
Hakunin great shaman. If he say he see then he see.
Hakunin great shaman. If he say he see then he see.
Then tell best way in base... now!
You tell me Navarro south. You lie! Me here for truth.
Me have friends who want me find vertibirds. Friends say vertibirds  come here.
Wait. Me have strong friends. They say Navarro here. You tell where  or things get messy!
Okay. Me thank. Me look there.
Me been there. It not Navarro.
You lie me. Me know Navarro here. You tell truth or me make you sorry!
Okay. Me thank. Me look there.
People interested. Me try find for them.
Shaman say metal bird take village, fly Navarro. Me try find.
You know about? What you know?
Me look for Navarro. This it?
You use radio and me make you sorry!
You tell me. Me be around.
Take pick. You tell Shi or Brotherhood of Steel or Hubologists.  Everybody interested.
You tell me. Me be around.
Wait. Me have strong friends. They say Navarro here. You tell where or things get messy!
Me look for Navarro. This it?
You see metal bird fly here?
Wait. Me have strong friends. They say Navarro here. You tell where or things get messy!
Wait. Me have strong friends. They say Navarro here. You tell where or things get messy!
Me look for Navarro. This it?
